languages.text: {n}Маражай поворачивается к вам — такой же, каким вы привыкли его видеть, разве что сквозь пергаментную кожу проступают сизые вены, а в глазах плещется нечто, похожее на страх.{/n} "Они ушли, {name}. Ушли, но все еще таятся у порога. Стерегут. Я слышу их шепоты. Как мон-кай могут выносить эти шепоты днями и неделями?" {n}В его голосе сквозит искреннее непонимание.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай поворачивается к вам — такой же, каким вы привыкли его видеть, разве что сквозь пергаментную кожу проступают сизые вены, а в глазах плещется нечто, похожее на страх.{/n} "Они ушли, {name}. Ушли, но все еще таятся у порога. Стерегут. Я слышу их шепоты. Как мон-кай могут выносить эти шепоты днями и неделями?" {n}В его голосе сквозит искреннее непонимание.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai turns to you, looking the same as ever — with the exception that you can see greyish-blue veins through his parchment skin and something resembling terror in his eyes.{/n} "They're gone, {name}. Gone but still lurking at the threshold. Keeping watch. I can hear their whispers. How do mon-keigh bear them for days and days on end?" {n}You hear genuine confusion in his voice.{/n}

Ушли, но все еще таятся у порога. Стерегут. Я слышу их шепоты. Как мон-кай могут выносить эти шепоты днями и неделями?" {n}В его голосе сквозит искреннее непонимание.{/n}

Gone but still lurking at the threshold. Keeping watch. I can hear their whispers. How do mon-keigh bear them for days and days on end?" {n}You hear genuine confusion in his voice.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se tourne vers vous, tel que vous l'avez toujours connu... si ce n'est que le bleu de ses veines transparaît sous sa peau parcheminée, et son regard semble noyé de terreur.{/n} « Ils sont partis, {name}. Et pourtant, ils errent encore à la lisière. Ils guettent. J'entends leurs murmures. Comment les mon-keigh parviennent-ils à les supporter des jours durant ? » {n}Vous relevez une confusion sincère dans le ton de sa voix.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you, looking the same as ever — with the exception that you can see greyish-blue veins through his parchment skin and something resembling terror in his eyes.{/n} "They're gone, {name}. Gone but still lurking at the threshold. Keeping watch. I can hear their whispers. How do mon-keigh bear them for days and days on end?" {n}You hear genuine confusion in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se tourne vers vous, tel que vous l'avez toujours connu... si ce n'est que le bleu de ses veines transparaît sous sa peau parcheminée, et son regard semble noyé de terreur.{/n} « Ils sont partis, {name}. Et pourtant, ils errent encore à la lisière. Ils guettent. J'entends leurs murmures. Comment les mon-keigh parviennent-ils à les supporter des jours durant ? » {n}Vous relevez une confusion sincère dans le ton de sa voix.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは相変わらずの様子であなたの方を振り向いた。しかし、羊皮紙のような皮膚からは灰色がかった青い血管が見えており、その目には恐怖に似た何かが宿っている。{/n}「みんな死んでしまった、{name}。死んだってのに、まだ境界線に潜んでいやがるんだ。見張り続けているんだ。囁き声が聞こえる。モン＝ケイたちはどうやって何日も耐え続けているんだ？」{n}彼の声には戸惑いが混ざっていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you, looking the same as ever — with the exception that you can see greyish-blue veins through his parchment skin and something resembling terror in his eyes.{/n} "They're gone, {name}. Gone but still lurking at the threshold. Keeping watch. I can hear their whispers. How do mon-keigh bear them for days and days on end?" {n}You hear genuine confusion in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは相変わらずの様子であなたの方を振り向いた。しかし、羊皮紙のような皮膚からは灰色がかった青い血管が見えており、その目には恐怖に似た何かが宿っている。{/n}「みんな死んでしまった、{name}。死んだってのに、まだ境界線に潜んでいやがるんだ。見張り続けているんだ。囁き声が聞こえる。モン＝ケイたちはどうやって何日も耐え続けているんだ？」{n}彼の声には戸惑いが混ざっていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋将目光转向你，看起来和以前没什么区别。不过，透过他惨白的皮肤，你看到了他灰蓝色的血管，还看到他的目光中带着某种类似于恐惧的情感。{/n}“他们走了，{name}。虽然消失了，但依然潜伏在面纱之外。保持警惕，我依然能听到他们的低语。猴子究竟是如何日复一日忍受这一切的？”{n}他的声音中带着真诚的困惑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you, looking the same as ever — with the exception that you can see greyish-blue veins through his parchment skin and something resembling terror in his eyes.{/n} "They're gone, {name}. Gone but still lurking at the threshold. Keeping watch. I can hear their whispers. How do mon-keigh bear them for days and days on end?" {n}You hear genuine confusion in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋将目光转向你，看起来和以前没什么区别。不过，透过他惨白的皮肤，你看到了他灰蓝色的血管，还看到他的目光中带着某种类似于恐惧的情感。{/n}“他们走了，{name}。虽然消失了，但依然潜伏在面纱之外。保持警惕，我依然能听到他们的低语。猴子究竟是如何日复一日忍受这一切的？”{n}他的声音中带着真诚的困惑。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai wendet sich zu dir. Er sieht aus wie immer, nur siehst du durch seine pergamentartige Haut hindurch graublaue Venen und in seinen Augen etwas wie Furcht.{/n} "Sie sind fort, {name}. Sie sind fort, lauern aber noch immer an der Schwelle. Halten Wache. Ich kann ihr Flüstern hören. Wie ertragen Chem-Pan-Sey das Tag für Tag für Tag?" {n}Du hörst aufrichtige Verwunderung in seiner Stimme.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you, looking the same as ever — with the exception that you can see greyish-blue veins through his parchment skin and something resembling terror in his eyes.{/n} "They're gone, {name}. Gone but still lurking at the threshold. Keeping watch. I can hear their whispers. How do mon-keigh bear them for days and days on end?" {n}You hear genuine confusion in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai wendet sich zu dir. Er sieht aus wie immer, nur siehst du durch seine pergamentartige Haut hindurch graublaue Venen und in seinen Augen etwas wie Furcht.{/n} "Sie sind fort, {name}. Sie sind fort, lauern aber noch immer an der Schwelle. Halten Wache. Ich kann ihr Flüstern hören. Wie ertragen Chem-Pan-Sey das Tag für Tag für Tag?" {n}Du hörst aufrichtige Verwunderung in seiner Stimme.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se vuelve hacia ti, con el mismo aspecto de siempre; excepto que ahora puedes ver un entramado de venillas verdeazuladas a través de su piel apergaminada, y algo parecido al terror en su mirada.{/n} «Se han ido, {name}. Se han ido, pero aún los noto acechando al otro lado del umbral. Vigilando. Oigo sus susurros. ¿Cómo pueden los mon-keigh soportarlos durante días y días?». {n}Percibes una genuina confusión en su voz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you, looking the same as ever — with the exception that you can see greyish-blue veins through his parchment skin and something resembling terror in his eyes.{/n} "They're gone, {name}. Gone but still lurking at the threshold. Keeping watch. I can hear their whispers. How do mon-keigh bear them for days and days on end?" {n}You hear genuine confusion in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se vuelve hacia ti, con el mismo aspecto de siempre; excepto que ahora puedes ver un entramado de venillas verdeazuladas a través de su piel apergaminada, y algo parecido al terror en su mirada.{/n} «Se han ido, {name}. Se han ido, pero aún los noto acechando al otro lado del umbral. Vigilando. Oigo sus susurros. ¿Cómo pueden los mon-keigh soportarlos durante días y días?». {n}Percibes una genuina confusión en su voz.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sana dönüyor. Parşömensi teninin altındaki grimsi mavi damarları ve gözlerindeki korkuyu andıran bakış haricinde aynı görünüyor.{/n} "Gittiler {name}. Gittiler ancak hâlâ pusuda bekliyorlar. Gözlüyorlar. Fısıltılarını duyabiliyorum. Mon-keighler bunlara günbegün nasıl katlanıyor?" {n}Sesindeki samimi şaşkınlığı hissedebiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns to you, looking the same as ever — with the exception that you can see greyish-blue veins through his parchment skin and something resembling terror in his eyes.{/n} "They're gone, {name}. Gone but still lurking at the threshold. Keeping watch. I can hear their whispers. How do mon-keigh bear them for days and days on end?" {n}You hear genuine confusion in his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sana dönüyor. Aynı görünüyor. Parşömen gibi teninin arkasındaki grimsi mavi damarları ve gözlerindeki korkuyu andıran şeyi görebilmen haricinde.{/n} "Gittiler {name}. Gittiler ancak hâlâ pusuda bekliyorlar. Gözlüyorlar. Fısıltılarını duyabiliyorum. Mon-keighler bunlara günbegün nasıl katlanabiliyor?" {n}Sesindeki samimi kafa karışıklığını hissedebiliyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
